definition: scroll/book/volume/chapter/examination paper/classifier for books, paintings: volume, scroll
to roll up/roll/classifier for small rolled things (wad of paper money, movie reel etc)
axis/axle/spool (for thread)/roller (for scrolls)/classifier for calligraphy rolls etc
see 壓軸戲|压轴戏[ya1 zhou4 xi4]/Taiwan pr. [zhou2]

sentences.english: How do I replace the latch spring on my 7000 Series reel?
sentences.chinese: 如何更換7000系列卷軸鎖緊裝置上的彈簧？

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a fur paste-up reel which belongs to the field of brede craftwork products.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型涉及刺繡工藝製品領域的毛皮拼貼卷軸。

sentences.english: It's a good all-around rod and reel and it's $20.00.''
sentences.chinese: 這是一套很好的全能杆和卷軸，價錢是20美元。

sentences.english: Forks type tooling for handling reels.
sentences.chinese: 叉手工具，用於搬運卷軸。

sentences.english: The thangka, or scroll painting, is a special art of Tibetan Buddhism.
sentences.chinese: 唐卡，又稱卷軸畫，是藏傳佛教的一種特殊藝術。

sentences.english: Scrolls of enchant armor will not work on these items.
sentences.chinese: 防具增強卷軸使用到項鍊上將不起作用。

sentences.english: In the course of using the device covered with plastic, the issue of floating scroll fracture was often appeared.
sentences.chinese: 在塑苫設備使用過程中，經常會發生浮卷軸斷裂現象。
日本的一種筆挺式卷軸畫。

sentences.english: Fix the top lath of the curtain onto the roller with the screws and washers provided.
sentences.chinese: 用提供的螺絲釘和墊片把卷簾頂部板條固定在卷軸上。

sentences.english: You might as well get the previous build, and then get the recipie when you go home.
sentences.chinese: 你也許看了上一套裝備，接着回家買個卷軸就可以了。

sentences.english: Can my spring driven reel be made "constant tension"?
sentences.chinese: 彈簧驅動卷軸可以改裝成“持續張緊”式卷軸嗎？

sentences.english: Can my spring driven reel be made "constant tension"?
sentences.chinese: 彈簧驅動卷軸可以改裝成“持續張緊”式卷軸嗎？

sentences.english: Then, I would advise you to buy an embroidered bamboo scroll.
sentences.chinese: 那樣，我建議您買刺繡竹卷軸畫。

sentences.english: This material was called ‘parchment’ and could be rolled up into a scroll.
sentences.chinese: 這種材料叫做“羊皮紙”，還可以捲成卷軸。

sentences.english: Most Chinese pictures are painted on silk scrolls.
sentences.chinese: 中國畫大都是畫在絹卷軸上的。

definition: item made from woven silk or rayon
to affix a seal/to stamp (a document)
